sourcesContent:
Login

{{error}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from '../Authentication/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { username: string = ''; password: string = ''; error: string = ''; constructor(private authService: AuthService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } login() { this.authService.login(this.username, this.password) .subscribe( data => { // Navigate to dashboard or home page }, error => { this.error = 'Login failed'; }); } }
